quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
quotes.author: Martin Fowler

quotes.text: The best error message is the one that never shows up.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuchs

quotes.text: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it's bad.
quotes.author: Cory House

quotes.text: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
quotes.author: John Johnson

quotes.text: Programming isn't about what you know; it's about what you can figure out.
quotes.author: Chris Pine

quotes.text: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.text: To be, or not to be, that is the question.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.text: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
quotes.author: John 1:1

quotes.text: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.text: I think, therefore I am.
quotes.author: René Descartes

quotes.text: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Life must be understood backward. But it must be lived forward.
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.text: The important thing is not to stop questioning.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Science is a way of thinking much more than it is a body of knowledge.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.text: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The good thing about science is that it's true whether or not you believe in it.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: In science, there is only physics; all the rest is stamp collecting.
quotes.author: Ernest Rutherford

2.name: Medium
2.description: Medium length quotes with moderate complexity

3.name: Hard
3.description: Long quotes with complex vocabulary and punctuation
